# Dynamic Documents

```{r}
install.packages("git2r")
git2r::checkout(branch = "02dynamic-documents")
git2r::reset("origin/02dynamic-documents", "hard")
```

# External Dependencies

```{r}
install.packages("renv")
library(renv)
init(bare = TRUE)
install.packages("ggplot2", "rmarkdown", "remotes", "Rcpp", "git2r")
remotes::install_github("wlandau/targets")
snapshot()
```

# Internal Dependencies

```{r}
git2r::checkout(branch = "03external-dependencies")
git2r::reset("origin/03external-dependencies", "hard")
```

```{r}
renv::restore()
```

```{r}
targets::tar_make()
```
